dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.threat.tech.SecurityThreatTechnique
dataStructure.description:
A misuse of a legitimate service to exploit and an IT resource.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityThreatTechnique

child.name: name
child.description:
A human-readable name to a given threat technique.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
Free text description of the technique.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: unauthorizedResults
child.description:
Description of the unauthorized results obtained through the use of this technique

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: unauthorizedResults

child.name: type
child.description:
Enumerated List of the technique types, such as: Social Engineering Physical Insertion Physical Destruction Physical Denial of Service Logical Denial of Service Logical Code Insertion Logical Destruction

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: type

child.name: cweUsed
child.description:
The weakness used by the technique defined as a Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE). Http://cwe.mitre.org

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: cweUsed

child.name: securityThreat
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is optional
child.label: securityThreat
